Package bacnet.utils

Class ArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacnet.utils.ArrayUtils
  • public class ArrayUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Public class with general array manipulation utilities, not specific to PROJECTNAME.
    Author:
    Christophe Becavin

      • sortColumn

        public static java.lang.String[][] sortColumn​(java.lang.String[][] array,
                                              int index,
                                              boolean number)
        Sort a column inside a String[][] array

        WARNING: if two values are the same in the column, it will display only the first one with this value in the sorted array
        Parameters:
        array - to classify
        index - of the column to sort
        number - True, it sorts the column using Arrays.sort(Double)
        False, it uses Arrays.sort(String)
        Returns:
